-e ---

𒌝 -um -on superfluous Akkadian suffix (ø in Sumerian roots)

𒀀𒊮 A.ŠÀ acre "field" 𒀀𒊮𒌝 eqlum eḳlim "field"

make / mark / mais / mas

𓁹 𒈠 -ma make suffix independent of future / past forms?

𒈠 ≈ 𒌝 ≈ 𒅎 um/em/muru₃ as suffix

𒈠 •mais conjunctive particle, often translated as “and” or “but” <> ù 𒅇 𓁹

𓅓 𓂝 𓎡 mark! look…

𓂜 ⇔ 𒁀𒈝 balum "without" بِلَا bilā בְּלִי bli
